abstract: Sandeep Aggarwal was charged with leaking secret information about a joint venture between Microsoft and Yahoo to at least two different hedge funds, including SAC Capital Advisors.
snippet: Sandeep Aggarwal was charged with leaking secret information about a joint venture between Microsoft and Yahoo to at least two different hedge funds, including SAC Capital Advisors.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities, continuing their campaign against insider trading, announced criminal charges on Tuesday against a former research analyst in a case connected to last week’s indictment of the hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors.

headline.main: Ex-Stock Analyst Charged With Insider Trading in Case Tied to SAC Indictment
headline.print_headline: Ex-Stock Analyst Charged With Insider Trading in Case Tied to SAC Capital Indictment
